column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We waited for half an hour on a rainy Monday night
column4: even I was hungry at the time I still think it was underwhelmed. I had the premium (mix of chicken and pork broth) and my mom had the Tonkotsu (pork broth only) because I know the ramen pork broth is usually salty. We were happy at first
column6: the broth tastes pretty good the first few spoons but then it gets saltier and saltier until I feel like my tongue got numb and can't keep on then I only try to finish the noodle
column7: my mom had to pour in a bit of water into her bowl to make it less salty haha So I would recommend the full chicken or veggie broth to anyone who doesn't need a sodium boost after a bowl of ramen.
